sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const LatestCourses = () => { const [course, setCourse] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${Baseurl}latestcourses`, { }).then((res) => { if (res.data) { setCourse(res.data) } }) }, []) return ( <>
Latest Courses {course.length ? course.map((item, index) => { return ( <>
Tutor
1 days ago
Latest
{item.course_title}
Preview
) }) :
}
) } export default LatestCourses
